price: Usibye ko nabihishuriwe kuko ndi umuburizi ugaragara.”
arabic: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: in yūḥā ilayya illā annamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
